name: Fresh Apple Soy Candle
description:
Fresh Apple is a seasonal candle with the true scent of a fresh cut apple right from the tree.
This candle is long lasting and highly scented. It is brilliantly colored bright green and finished with a natural jute ribbon.
Our seasonal candles are only around for a limited time each year, so get them while supplies last. 

Choose from:
small (8oz) mason jar with one cotton wick and a burn time of 40 to 72 hours
large (16oz) mason jar with one cotton wick and a burn time of 80 to 120 hours

At WAXroots, our candles are made with natural and safe ingredients. We use 100% natural soy wax, never a vegetable blend that may include paraffin (a petroleum byproduct). In addition, soy wax burns longer and cleaner, so you can sit back and relax.

What is in our candles?
soy wax from USA grown (non-GMO) soybeans
cotton wicks (no zinc or lead)
essential oils and phthalate free fragrances 

Not tested on animals. 
Hand poured in San Diego, CA.

name: Pomegranate Soy Candle
description:
Pomegranate is a seasonal candle with the scent of sweet pomegranate. This is the perfect fall candle. It will delight you through all of the San Diego pomegranate season, September – February. 
Our seasonal candles are only around for a limited time each year, so get them while supplies last. 

(8oz) mason jar with one cotton wick and a burn time of 40 to 72 hours

At WAXroots, our candles are made with natural and safe ingredients. We use 100% natural soy wax, never a vegetable blend that may include paraffin (a petroleum byproduct). In addition, soy wax burns longer and cleaner, so you can sit back and relax.

What is in our candles?
soy wax from USA grown (non-GMO) soybeans
cotton wicks (no zinc or lead)
essential oils and phthalate free fragrances 

Not tested on animals. 
Hand poured in San Diego, CA.

name: Scentherapy Hydrosol
description:
True Aromatherapy to relax with.

This spray is a delicate blend of chamomile floral water and lavender essential oil. 

This product contains no alcohol, no fragrances, no additives, no artificial ingredients, and is not watered down. All ingredients used are therapeutic grade.

Use it as a linen spray, air freshener, and mood enhancer. This combination of plant origins is designed to relax and help with insomnia.

Ingredients: Chammomile Floral water, Lavender essential oil

Made in USA, and not tested on animals.

name: Room Spray & Odor Eliminator
description:
WAXroots room spray & odor eliminator will remove unpleasant odors, not just mask them. Contains phthalate free fragrances and essential oils and has not been tested on animals.

Available in two sizes:
Small (2oz)
Large (4oz)

Available Scents:
Fresh Apple (seasonal) – Fresh sliced apple, ripe off the tree.

Pomegranate (seasonal) – Sweet and juicy pomegranate.

Cucumber & Cantaloupe – The summertime aroma of sweet succulent cantaloupe, fused with cool crisp cucumbers.

Clean - The lightly floral scent of fresh laundry still warm from the dryer. Light aromas embrace citrus, jasmine, peony, lilac, vanilla, and musk.

Cherry Blossom - Cherry blossoms mixed with floral garden delights and a soft musk.

Mango Berry - Sweet mango and decadent berries.

Spearmintlyptus - The scent of eucalyptus and spearmint refreshed with lime and balanced with patchouli.

Rose - The unmistakable aroma of a bouquet of fresh cut roses. 

Room Spray Ingredients: Water, polysorbate 20, polysorbate 80, methylchloroisothiazolinone, methylisothiazolinone, sodium laurel sulfate, disodium cupic citrate, citric acid, fragrance.

Not tested on animals. 
Made in San Diego, CA.

name: Perfect Anytime Gift Set
description:
The Perfect Anytime Gift Set includes one votive soy wax candle (3oz) and one small room spray of the same scent.

WAXroots candles are made with only natural, sustainable, and biodegradable materials: pure soy wax, cotton wicks, and phthalate free fragrances and essential oils. 

WAXroots room spray & odor eliminator will remove unpleasant odors, not just mask them. Contains phthalate free fragrances and has not been tested on animals.

What is in our candles?
soy wax from USA grown (non-GMO) soybeans
cotton wicks (no zinc or lead)
essential oils and phthalate free fragrances 

Room Spray Ingredients: Water, polysorbate 20, polysorbate 80, methylchloroisothiazolinone, methylisothiazolinone, sodium laurel sulfate, disodium cupic citrate, citric acid, fragrance.

Not tested on animals. 
Hand poured in San Diego, CA.

name: Pink Grapefruit and Mint Scentherapy Essential Oil Candle
description:
In this candle is a composed blend of pink grapefruit essential oil and spearmint essential oil. The pink grapefruit brings the fresh citrus scent of juicy grapefruit flesh and works together with the scent of sweet mint.

The holistic effect of this blend of essential oils will uplift the spirit, sweep away fatigue, and leave behind depression.

This candle is a wholly pure and natural soy candle. It contains only USA grown, non-GMO, soy wax and essential oils. The wick has a cotton core and is treated with the same natural soy wax. No dyes, chemicals, or additives are used. Creating a perfectly balanced unpolluted aroma-therapeutic experience.

Choose from:
the Small (4oz) Glass Jelly Jar with one cotton wick and a burn time of 20 to 36 hours {out of stock until January 2014}
the Large (8oz) Glass Jelly Jar with one cotton wick and a burn time of 40 to 72 hours

At WAXroots, our candles are made with natural and safe ingredients. We use 100% natural soy wax, never a vegetable blend that may include paraffin (a petroleum byproduct). In addition, soy wax burns longer and cleaner, so you can sit back and relax.

What is in our candles?
soy wax from USA grown (non-GMO) soybeans
cotton wicks (no zinc or lead)
essential oils and phthalate free fragrances 

Not tested on animals. 
Hand poured in San Diego, CA.

name: Soy Wax Tart Melts
description:
WAXroots tart melts can be used in any wax warmer/melter. Since our soy wax has such a low melting point, it does especially well in popular low temperature wax warmers.
Tart melts are made with the same pure soy wax and phthalate free fragrances as our candles making them a great, safe alternative for wax warmer refills.

Available Scents:
Fresh Apple (seasonal) – Fresh sliced apple, ripe off the tree.

Pomegranate (seasonal) – Sweet and juicy pomegranate.

Pumpkin Pie (seasonal) – The scent of a warm pumpkin pie; pumpkin and vanilla fragrance with ginger, clove, and cinnamon essential oils. 

Candy Corn Crunch (seasonal) - Sweet scent of strawberry, bergamot, vanilla and sugar.

Cucumber & Cantaloupe – The summertime aroma of sweet succulent cantaloupe, fused with cool crisp cucumbers.

Clean - The lightly floral scent of fresh laundry still warm from the dryer. Light aromas embrace citrus, jasmine, peony, lilac, vanilla, and musk.

French Vanilla & Amber - The sensual aroma of creamy vanilla and woodsy 
cedarwood, oakmoss, sandalwood, and patchouli.

Green Clover & Aloe – This scent will keep you refreshed with the aroma of cool aloe and fresh green clover.

Mango Berry - Sweet mango and decadent berries.

Spearmintlyptus - The scent of eucalyptus and spearmint refreshed with lime and balanced with patchouli.

Rose - The unmistakable aroma of a bouquet of fresh cut roses. 

Not tested on animals. 
Hand-poured in San Diego, CA.

name: Candy Corn Crunch Soy Candle
description:
